Architecture: amd64 arm64 armel ia64 m68k mips64el mipsel ppc64el riscv64 loong64 all
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), quilt, chrpath, libboost-system-dev, libboost-date-time-dev, libboost-test-dev, libboost-iostreams-dev, gfortran, libtinyxml-dev, bc, zlib1g-dev, libtool, libopm-grid-dev (>= 2025.10~), doxygen, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-latex-recommended, ghostscript, pkgconf, mpi-default-dev, mpi-default-bin
Package-List: libopm-upscaling deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-upscaling-bin deb science optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-upscaling-dev deb libdevel optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-upscaling-doc deb doc optional arch=all
